#
# Default settings for the simulation
#

## Scenario settings
Scenario.name = "Testing_Experiment"
RandomSeed = 1673916419715
Scenario.simulateConnections = true
Scenario.updateInterval = 0.1
# 43k ~= 12h
Scenario.endTime = 43k
wireless_lan.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
wireless_lan.transmitSpeed = 540k
wireless_lan.transmitRange = 13

switch.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
switch.transmitSpeed = 250k
switch.transmitRange = 10

changed_wifi.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
changed_wifi.transmitSpeed = 0k
changed_wifi.transmitRange = 13

hub.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
hub.transmitSpeed = 250k
hub.transmitRange = 10

emane.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
emane.transmitSpeed = 250k
emane.transmitRange = 10

wireless.type = SimpleBroadcastInterface
# transmit speed of 2 Mbps = 250kBps
wireless.transmitSpeed = 540k
wireless.transmitRange = 20


Scenario.nrofHostGroups = 7

# common settings for all groups
Group.movementModel = ClusterMovement
Group.router = EpidemicRouter
Group.bufferSize = 5M
Group.waitTime = 0, 120
#All nodes have the firstinterface inteface
Group.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group.interface1 = 
# walking speeds
Group.speed = 0.5, 1.5
#Group.msgTtl = 60

Group.nrofHosts = 40
Group.nrofApplications = 0
Group0.groupID = a
Group0.nrofHosts = 1
Group0.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group0.interface0= wireless_lan

Group0.movementModel = RandomWaypoint

Group1.groupID = b
Group1.nrofHosts = 2
Group1.nrofInterfaces = 2
Group1.interface0= wireless_lan

Group1.interface1= switch

Group1.movementModel = RandomWaypoint

Group2.groupID = c
Group2.nrofHosts = 3
Group2.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group2.interface0= switch

Group2.movementModel = Static

Group3.groupID = d
Group3.nrofHosts = 4
Group3.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group3.interface0= changed_wifi

Group3.movementModel = RandomWaypoint

Group4.groupID = e
Group4.nrofHosts = 5
Group4.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group4.interface0= hub

Group4.movementModel = Static

Group5.groupID = f
Group5.nrofHosts = 6
Group5.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group5.interface0= emane

Group5.movementModel = RandomWaypoint

Group6.groupID = g
Group6.nrofHosts = 7
Group6.nrofInterfaces = 1
Group6.interface0= wireless

Group6.movementModel = RandomWaypoint




## Message creation parameters
# How many event generators
Events.nrof = 2
# Class of the first event generator
Events0.class = MessageEventGenerator
# (following settings are specific for the MessageEventGenerator class)
# Creation interval in seconds (one new message every 25 to 35 seconds)
Events0.interval = 25,35
# Message sizes (50kB - 150kB)
Events0.size = 50k,150k
# range of message source/destination addresses
Events0.hosts = 0,120
# Message ID prefix
Events0.prefix = M

# Class of the first event generator
Events1.class = changedBurst
# (following settings are specific for the MessageEventGenerator class)
# Creation interval in seconds (one new message every 25 to 35 seconds)
Events1.interval = 25,35
# Message sizes (50kB - 150kB)
Events1.size = 50k,150k
# range of message source/destination addresses
Events1.hosts = 0,120
# Message ID prefix
Events1.prefix = M


## Movement model settings
# seed for movement models' pseudo random number generator (default = 0)
MovementModel.rngSeed = 1
# World's size for Movement Models without implicit size (width, height; meters)
MovementModel.worldSize = 4800, 3400
# How long time to move hosts in the world before real simulation
MovementModel.warmup = 1000


# how many events to show in the log panel (default = 30)
GUI.EventLogPanel.nrofEvents = 30
# Regular Expression log filter (see Pattern-class from the Java API for RE-matching details)
#GUI.EventLogPanel.REfilter = .*p[1-9]<->p[1-9]$
